game.name: Nosferatu: The Wrath of Malachi
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: It is a misty evening in the year of our lord 1912. The Pattersons, a poor but proud aristocratic family of the British nobility, and some of their closest friends, arrive at the castle Malachi residence of a wealthy Romanian Count.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It is a misty evening in the year of our lord 1912. The Pattersons, a poor but proud aristocratic family of the British nobility, and some of their closest friends, arrive at the castle Malachi residence of a wealthy Romanian Count.

reviewHighlights.text: 본인이랑 연배가 같은 게임이라 플레이 하기 껄끄럽다고 생각했으나 나름 할만함. 길치들은 길 찾기 힘들 듯
